explains: v. 减少；缩减（decrease 的现在分词）

sentences.en: Population growth is decreasing by 1.4% each year.
This species of bird is decreasing in numbers every year.
sentences.cn: 这种鸟的数量在逐年减少。

sentences.en: But experts say Japan is unique in that sales have been decreasing steadily behind time.
sentences.cn: 但专家表示，日本的独特之处在于其销售一直在有延迟地稳步下降。
